page.title: 02Law and Order 1 - Yardley
page.content: The people we questioned believed the area was average in the amount of crime it experienced.They believed this crime to be the result of unemployment, boredom and a lack of discipline.Some people believed there was a lack of police supervision and one person believed crime to be the result of the Governments lack of concern for the people and their giving the police too much power so that rebellion has resulted particularly amongst the young,this in itself leading to a break down in law and order.All of the people questioned believed punishments should be stricter because some criminals were not afraid to commit the same crime again.One person said there were too many suspended sentences and everyone agreed that haging should be brought back for murder,rape and chld abuse.
